message: To bring true decentralisation to the people, Satoshi first introduced their white paper back in 2008, promising people nothing more than a decentralised trustless tool built with blockchain technology.  Many believe it was as a response to the worldwide financial crisis being experienced at the time.  This has in the meantime blossomed into an enormous ecosystem with thousands of tokens available, each with very different and complex ecosystems and greatly varying organisational structure.
speaker: USER
